Line 18: Line 18:
'''nUbuntu''' or '''Network Ubuntu''' is a project to take the existing [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] distribution and remaster it as a [[LiveCD]] and Full Install with tools needed for [[penetration testing]] servers and [[Computer network|networks]]. The main idea is to keep Ubuntu's ease of use and mix it with popular penetration testing tools. Besides usage for network and server testing, nUbuntu will be made to be a desktop distribution for advanced Linux users. <br>
'''nUbuntu''' or '''Network Ubuntu''' is a project to take the existing [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] distribution and remaster it as a [[LiveCD]] and Full Install with tools needed for [[penetration testing]] servers and [[Computer network|networks]]. The main idea is to keep Ubuntu's ease of use and mix it with popular penetration testing tools. Besides usage for network and server testing, nUbuntu will be made to be a desktop distribution for advanced Linux users. <br>
â
Since this distribution is not updated for a long time (more than 540 days, as of May 2008), a user who wants a stable, updated, and secure system, with support for the latest hardware, can just use [[remastersys]] to easily create a customized Live CD/DVD of the latest version of ubuntu with their favorite tools and programs.
+
Since this distribution is not updated for a long time (more than 560 days, as of june 2008), a user who wants a stable, updated, and secure system, with support for the latest hardware, can just use [[remastersys]] to easily create a customized Live CD/DVD of the latest version of ubuntu with their favorite tools and programs.
